segments.advisor_message: So, uh, just to clarify, um, when we're talkin' about, you know, estate planning, that kinda involves things like wills and stuff like that.
segments.client_message: Yeah, but, um, what exactly does estate planning mean? Like, I-I don’t really get it.

segments.advisor_message: Right, right. So, an estate plan, it’s basically, um, a plan you have for what happens to your stuff after you're gone, right? So, do you, um, have a will in place?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, I do have a will. But, it's kinda old, I think... from like five years ago? I should check it.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, got it. And, um, do you know if you put, uh, a power of attorney in that will, or if that's somethin' you need to do separately?
segments.client_message: I think I did, but I’m not sure who it is. Maybe my sister? I-I guess I really need to look at it again.
